channel.title: Help item on item is bugged!
channel.description: hey guys so i have recently noticed that my itemuse && other item thing is bugged ! everytime i use an item on another item and it is registerd in the itemonitem thing the player would stop moving he would just glitch i can do anything in the game i can teleport anything but i can't move help me i need the itemonitem for some skills like crafting and herblore and fletching

item.title: Help item on item is bugged!
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:2, topic:399790”][quote author=own master link=topic=496909.msg3633333#msg3633333 date=1308416682]
hey guys so i have recently noticed that my itemuse && other item thing is bugged
! everytime i use an item on another item and it is registerd in the itemonitem thing the player would stop moving he would just glitch i can do anything in the game i can teleport anything but i can’t move help me i need the itemonitem for some skills like crafting and herblore and fletching
[/quote]
Look for your item on item void, and specify what items are giving you the glitch.[/quote]
well pretty much all the items that are used in delta flechtching,heblore,crafting and i have noticed this that i think all of them have resetWC();
at the end

Read full topic
item.source: Help item on item is bugged!
